title: Could not create cudnn handle: CUDNN_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED
body:

**Describe the problem**
I'm trying to create a 3D project for the first time.
The problem is in the Triangulation phase!
I was able to perform all the steps and calibrate the cameras successfully.
I have an error that happens in the Triangulation phase that says "Failed to get convolution algorithm".
I enclose to you the folder of the project and the error in the code.
Hope you can help

Please place code inside this:

